original: Johan Sigurd, prakt, läkare, Göteborg, f. 24/4/09 i Malmö av disp. Ivar W. o. Ada Eckerbom. G. 45 m. Gerd Louise Löfquist. Barn: Marianne f. 46. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 27, med. ikand. i Lund 30, med. lic. i Upps. 36. Stud :-res. t. Wien 3S, Paris 36. Assist :läk. v. Akad. sjukh. med. avd. 36, dito v. pediatr. klin. där 37 o. v. dess med. avd. 38, tf. aman. där s. å., tf. andre und :iläk. v. Svenshöigens sanat. 39, andre o. förste und:läk. v. med. avd. å las. i Skellefteå 39-41, aman. v. Akad. sjukh. ’barnklin. 41-45, prakt. läk. i Gbg sed. 45. Tjänstgj. i Helsingfors ss. liäk. v. barnöverför, t. Sv:e 4i2. Skr.: ett lO-tal skr., huv:sakl. av pediatr. inneh. , Arvid Emil, taxeringsintendent, Halmstad, f. 19/1/99 i Gälila-ryd, Jönköp. 1. G. 30 m,. Ed len Maria Olsson. Barn: Stig-Eric f. 31. — Stud:ex. i Lund 19, jur. kand. där 25. Rättsibild. bitr. i Västmanl. östra doms. 26-28, anst. v. läns styr. i östergötl. 1. fr. 29, e. o. ’länsbokhåll. s. å., ord. andre o. tf. förste länsbokhåll. 37, läns-bokhåll. 43. Utn. t. taxeringsintendent i Kronob. 1. 44, uppeh. motsv. tj. i Ös-stergötil. 1. 44-47, transp. t. Hall. 1. 47. Allm. omb. f. övervak, av sparb. för-valtn. fr. 30, revis. i Östergötl. 1. hus-h :sällsk. egnah :nd 33-40, revis. i Östergötl. erk. centr :’sjukk. fr. 45, sekr. o. omh :mani i Linköp. bar nav :nd 45-47.
translated:
Johan Sigurd, physician, Gothenburg, born on April 24, 1909 in Malmö to Ivar W. and Ada Eckerbom. Married in 1945 to Gerd Louise Löfquist. Children: Marianne, born in 1946. Completed high school in Gothenburg in 1927, medical studies at Lund University in 1930, obtained a medical license in Uppsala in 1936. Studied abroad in Vienna in 1935 and Paris in 1936. Assistant physician at the medical department of the Academic Hospital in 1936, as well as at the pediatric clinic from 1937-1938. Temporary assistant medical officer at Svenshöjden sanatorium in 1939. Worked as second and first assistant medical officer at the medical department in Lasarette, Skellefteå from 1939-1941. Assistant at the Pediatric Clinic of the Academic Hospital from 1941-1945. Practicing physician in Gothenburg since 1945. Served in Helsinki as a physician for child transfer to Sweden. Has written about 10 publications, mainly related to pediatrics. 

Arvid Emil, tax inspector, Halmstad, born on January 19, 1899 in Gälila-ryd, Jönköping. Married in 1930 to Edlen Maria Olsson. Child: Stig-Eric, born in 1931. Completed high school in Lund in 1919 and obtained a law degree there in 1925. Worked as a legal assistant at Västmanland Eastern District Court from 1926-1928, employed by the County Board in Östergötland from 1929-1943, serving as an extra deputy county accountant and later as the second and temporary first county accountant. Appointed as a county accountant in 1943. Appointed as a tax inspector in Kronoberg County in 1944, transferred to Östergötland County in 1944-1947, and then to Halland County in 1947. Served as a general representative for supervising savings management since 1930, auditor for Östergötland County House Owners' Association from 1933-1940, auditor for Östergötland Recognized Central Hospital from 1945, and secretary for Linköping Bar Association from 1945-1947.
